statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID DESC) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.ChannelID , AA.OrderDate , AA.OrderNo , AA.OrderSeq , AA.GoodsCode , AA.GoodsName , AA.Option1 , AA.Option2 , AA.Orderer , AA.OrdererEmail , AA.OrdererMobile , AA.OrdererTelNo , AA.Recipient , AA.RecipientMobile , AA.RecipientTelNo , AA.PostalCode , AA.RecipientAddress , AA.Description , AA.OrderQty , AA.SupplyPrice , AA.SupplyAmt , AA.SalePrice , AA.SaleAmt , AA.DeliveryFee , AA.CouponAmt , AA.DealNo , AA.BrandID , AA.DueDate , AA.GiftName , AA.Status , AA.FileUploadID , AA.OrderID , AA.OrderItemID
, CC.Name as ChannelName , BB.Name as BrandName , M1.Name as StatusName
FROM dbo.TChannelOrder AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN IKBiz.dbo.TChannel CC WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ChannelID = CC.ID LEFT JOIN IKBiz.dbo.TBrand BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.BrandID = BB.ID LEFT JOIN IKBase.dbo.TCode M1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.Status = M1.Code AND M1.ParentCode = 'ChannelOrderStatus' WHERE 1=1 AND AA.OrderDate = #OrderDate#
AND AA.ChannelID = #ChannelID#
AND AA.BrandID = #BrandID#
ORDER BY RowNo
SELECT * FROM dbo.TChannelOrder AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#

SELECT * FROM dbo.TChannelOrder AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1
AND AA.OrderNo = #OrderNo#
AND AA.OrderSeq = #OrderSeq#
AND AA.GoodsCode = #GoodsCode#
SELECT TOP 1 AA.* FROM dbo.TChannelOrder AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ChannelID = #ChannelID# AND AA.GoodsCode = #GoodsCode# AND AA.BrandID IS NOT NULL ORDER BY AA.ID DESC
